name: Pierre & Acrylique Estrie
overview:
Pierre et Acrylique de L’estrie is a typical local company that has been selling and installing artificial stone and brick for already seven years. The company can rely on many stone manufacturers from Québec. Pierre et Acrylique de L’Estrie offers quality service and is always tuned in to their clients’ needs. The main strength of Pierre et Acrylique de L’Estrie is that they use a personalised and competitive approach. The company’s headquarters are located in Coaticook. Pierre et Acrylique de L’Estrie has become well known for its exceptional designs and constructions.

The owner Stéphane Provencher has surrounded himself with designers, interior decorators, cabinetmakers, contractors and many more. The company has a wide range of mind-blowing projects that have already been realized. As the owner Stéphane Provencher participates in each and every project. Every project was a challenge that Mr. Provencher accepted with a lot of pleasure. Innovating is one of the greatest satisfactions for Stéphane Provencher owner of Pierre et Acrylique de L’estrie.
